#summary Building the plugin
#labels Phase-Implementation

For normal use, when you develop Android applications using android-maven-plugin, you never have to do the things detailed here. Only those who develop android-maven-plugin do.


= How to build android-maven-plugin =

 * Install Android SDK
 * Check out the [http://code.google.com/p/maven-android-plugin/wiki/Source?tm=4 source code] for android-maven-plugin.
 * mvn clean install

= How to use a custom build of the plugin =

 * If you use the plugin within a project, just update the version to  
the version of the codebase you just built.
 * If you invoke the plugin outside a Maven project specify the version like so e.g.

{{{mvn com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.generation2:android-maven-plugin:3.0.0-SNAPSHOT:undeploy -Dandroid.package=com.simplgility.android.helloflashlight}}}

= How to build Samples for android-maven-plugin =

 * Install Android SDK 

 * Check out the [http://code.google.com/p/maven-android-plugin/wiki/Source?tm=4 source code] for maven-android-plugin-samples.
 * attach a emulator or devices optionally
 * mvn clean install
